Detailed Description

Show observed bitmap on the 2D-console.

This class extends standard 2D-console to provide background bitmap object.

virtual const i2d::ITransformation2d* iqt2d::CImageViewComp::GetCalibration ( ) const [virtual]

Get access to transformation object, which transforms a local logical coordinate system to global one.

Returns:
Pointer to transformation if it is accessible, or NULL.

Implements i2d::ICalibrationProvider.
